briefTitle: Assessment of the Transfer of Using Levonorgestrel Intrauterine System (LNG IUS) as a Contraceptive to Using it as Part of Hormone Replacement Therapy (HRT).
officialTitle: A 60-month Non-comparative Study on Bleeding Profiles With Levonorgestrel Intrauterine System in Transition From Reproductive Age Contraception to Menopause Age Endometrial Protection During Estrogen Replacement Therapy.
summary: The study has been designed to look at the transfer from using LNG IUS for contraception only, in reproductive age to using it for endometrial protection in menopausal age. The main area of interest in the study is the pattern of any vaginal bleeding that occurs.

primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Last 90 days in Contraception Phase and first 360 days in Hormone-Replacement Therapy (HRT) Phase
